author: cms-L1TK
body:
**UPDATE: This should be coupled with fixed CMSSW PR #34028 rather than the earlier mentioned**

This PR must be coupled with cms-sw PR #34028 (update of L1 tracking algorithm) and should be merged and go in to the same release. 

- Removes files that become unused with code updates in PR #34028
- Updated configuration files for the extended (displaced) tracking to work with new InputRouter module

=> Please only merge when PR #34028 (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34028) gets included!
title: Update data-files (match cms-sw PR #34028)
